ygData.subject: (sigh~~~~~~)
ygData.msgSnippet: (sigh~~~~) i have played everquest for almost 2 years.....i love this game so much that my best record on playing everquest is 30 hours...without any sleep!
ygData.messageBody:
(sigh~~~~) i have played everquest for almost 2
years.....i love this game so much that my best record on
playing everquest is 30 hours...without any sleep! But
something! something bad happened...my account was cancelled
as i am sharing this account with my friend...i have
so many stuff in this account..<br>Its has been a
few month....i wished it still work..I have a lv 27
bard with loz of rare item such as steel singing boot,
and more<br>and also a lv 30++ shadow knight....with
some nice stuff on him too<br>The bard is on the
server of Thullexe pallexe<br>and the shadow knight is
on the nameless.<br>The reason why i am posting this
is to wished anyone can help me for keep subscribing
by credit card....or...i can sell my account in the
cheapest rate...<br>For further information u can reply
this message or reply to wos830@...<br>Wish u
guys have a great day on everquest!!<br>EVERQUEST
RULZ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
